rukus.text: 23|51|(nam anuppiya ovvoru tutaraiyum nokki) “en tutarkale! Ninkal paricuttamanavarraiye puciyunkal. Narkariyankalaiye ceyyunkal. Niccayamaka nan ninkal ceypavarrai nankariven

23|52|niccayamaka unkal inta markkam ore oru valitan. (Itil verrumai kitaiyatu.) Nantan unkal iraivan. Akave, ninkal ennaiye ancunkal'' (enru kattalai ittiruntom. Avarkalum tam makkalukku ivvare kuri vantanar)
23|53|eninum, (yutarkalum, kirittavarkalum) tankal vetattai(p puratti) palavarakap pirittukkontu (avarkalil) ovvoru vakupparum tankalitam ullavarraik kontu cantosam ataikinranar
23|54|akave, (napiye!) Nir avarkalai oru kalam varai avarkalutaiya mayakkattil alntu kitakka vittu vituviraka
23|55|Nam avarkalukku an cantatikalaiyum porulkalaiyum kotuttu varuvataip parri avarkal enna ninaittuk kontanar
23|56|itanal niccayamaka nam avarkalukku nanmai ceyvatil tiviramaka irukkirom enru ninaikkinranara? Avvaralla! (Atu etarkaka enpatai) avarkal unarntu kollavillai
23|57|niccayamaka evarkal tankal iraivanukkup payantu natunkik kontirukkirarkalo avarkalum
23|58|evarkal tankal iraivanin vacanankalai meyyakave nampikkaikolkirarkalo avarkalum
23|59|evarkal tankal iraivanukku evaraiyum inai akkamal irukkinranaro avarkalum
23|60|evarkal tankalukkuc cattiyamana varai tanam kotuppatutan avarkalutaiya ullankal niccayamaka tankal iraivanitam celvom enru payantu kontirukkinranavo avarkalum
23|61|akiya ivarkaltan nanmaiyana kariyankalil viraintu celkiravarkal. Melum, avarkal avarrai ceyvatil oruvarai oruvar muntik kolkinranar

23|62|enta or atmavaiyum atan caktikku atikamaka (etaiyum ceyyumpati) nam nirppantippatillai. (Ovvoruvarin) unmaiyai uraikkum tinacarik kurippum nam'mitam irukkiratu. (Avarkalin nanmaiyaik kuraitto pavattai atikappatuttiyo) avarkal aniyayam ceyyappata mattarkal
23|63|eninum, (nirakarikkum) avarkalutaiya ullankal i(vvetat)taip parri (cantekittu) matamaiyil alntu kitakkinrana. Itaiyanri avarkal ceytu kontirukkum veru pala (tiya)kariyankalum irukkinrana
23|64|akave, avarkalin talaivarkalai vetanaiyaik kontu nam pitittuk kontalo, avarkal (annerattil titukkittut tankalai kapparrumpati) payantu captamitukinranar
23|65|(Accamayam avarkalai nokki) ‘‘inraiya tinam ninkal payantu captamitatirkal. Niccayamaka ninkal nam'mal utavi ceyyappata mattirkal
23|66|niccayamaka enatu vacanankal unkalukku otik kanpikkappatta accamayam (avarraip purakkanittu) ninkal pin vankinirkal
23|67|ninkal karvankontu (unkal) irak kataikalilum itaip parri (parikacam ceytu) pitarrik kontiruntirkal'' (enru kurappatum)
23|68|(nam) vakkiyattai avarkal kavanikkavillaiya? Allatu avarkalutaiya muntiya mutataikalukku varatatu etum ivarkalukku vantuvittata
23|69|allatu tankalitam vanta tutarai tankal ariyavillai enpataka(k kuri) avarkal nirakarikkinranara

23|70|allatu ‘‘avarukkup paittiyam pitittirukkiratu'' ena ivarkal kurukinranara? Ivai onrumillai. (Nam tutar) avarkalukkuc cattiyattaik kontu vantar. Eninum, avarkalil perumpalanavarkal anta cattiyattaiye verukkinranar

23|71|cattiyam avarkalutaiya (tappana) viruppattaip pinparruvatenral niccayamaka vanankalum pumiyum avarril ullavaiyum alintuvitum. Eninum, avarkalukku nalla upatecattaiye anuppinom. Avarkalo tankalitam vanta nallupatecattai purakkanittu vittanar
23|72|allatu, nir avarkalitam oru kuliyai ketkirira? (Atuvum illai. Enenral,) umatu iraivan (umakkut) tarum kuliye mikka melanatakum. Avano kotaiyalikalilellam mikka melanavan avan
23|73|(napiye!) Niccayamaka nir avarkalai nerana valikke alaikkirir
23|74|evarkal marumaiyai nampikkai kollavillaiyo niccayamaka avarkal nerana valiyaip purakkanittavarkalakave irukkinranar
23|75|Nam avarkal mitu karunai kanpittu avarkalukku erpatta ciramattai nikkiyapotilum avarkal tankal valikettileye mulkit tattalikinranar
23|76|niccayamaka nam avarkalai vetanaiyaik kontu pitittuk kontom. Anal, avarkal tankal iraivanitam tirumpavum illai; (avanitam) panintu pirarttanai ceyyavum illai
23|77|avarkal mitu katinamana vetanaiyin oru vayilait tirantu vittalo avarkal titukkittut tankal nampikkaiyai murrilum ilantu vitukinranar
